overview: Club Jenna's Sophia Rossi is back and more beautiful then ever, in her second feature directed by Laurent Sky. Take a journey into her mind, where she will reveal all her wildest fantasies. Visually captivating and sexually enchanting, this film presents Sophia at her sexiest. Experience Sophia like never before - elegant, voluptuous, glamorous and heart stopping. Sophia Revealed will have you on the edge of your seat begging for more!
title: Sophia Revealed
